GenAiPlannerDefinition.name: GenAiPlannerDefinition
GenAiPlannerDefinition.description: Represents an agent planner service that uses a large language model (LLM) and a reasoning strategy to decompose a given task into smaller subtasks, identify the most suitable actions for each subtask, and invoke them.

Capabilities.description: A set of tags associated with the agent planner service definition.

Description.description: A description explaining the general purpose and domain of the agent planner service definition.

DeveloperName.description: The unique name for this object.

Language.description: The language of the GenAiPlannerDefinition. The value for this field is the language value of the org.

MasterLabel.description: The master label of the agent planner service definition.

PlannerType.description: A particular approach to problem solving that is given as prompt instructions to a large language model (LLM).
